Articles.Content:
This is the - How do you pronounce Of The Day, and I ask you one question:

How do you pronounce cheater? As we all know, this pops up all the time. Personally, I pronounce it like: Chee - ter. How do you pronounce this stuff?

![bandwagon.gif](http://www.aisd.net/aisd/Portals/39/band%20files/bandwagon.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-24T18:03:57Z" title="07/24/2015 06:03  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 24, 2015</time> by TheCanadianVendingMachine**

I pronounce it like "pleÃ‰Âª-Ã‰ÂªÃ…â€¹-wÃ‰ÂªÃŽÂ¸-stÃ‰â€™k-pÃ‰â€˜rts".

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-24T18:03:07Z" title="07/24/2015 06:03  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 24, 2015</time> by mythbusters844**
Guys, this is getting ridiculous. It only ends when yall stop the idiocity.
I pronounce the ch like an sh, so all cheaters are sheaters. So it's sheating.

Hey true story: I did high school in the US and back then I was still learning the english language and one day in summer school during history class the teacher split the class into two groups and I was seated back in the room. She was asking stuff about Roosevelt to the other group and one guy had the book hidden under the desk in his lap and was looking at the answers. I got pissed and yelled: "Hey! They are cheating over there!"

Except my english was really bad back then and english doesn't go well with portuguese phonetics and anyway, it came out "Hey! They're s.h.i.t.t.i.n.g. over there!"

Needless to say the whole class started laughing. Even the teacher was trying to hold her laughter. I never felt worse in my life!
I pronounce it like "High Per Edd Et." To be fair, I cheat a lot of the time nowadays because if I didn't, I would give up due to reasons.

Oh dear god, the threads have merged.

I think we've had enough of this now...
Lmao I was waiting for this thread

In the interest of preventing General Discussion from becoming Pronunciation Discussion, we are directing all pronunciation talk to the most general of the pronunciation threads here: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/129524](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/129524)

Closed.
